    • updateContact

      public void updateContact()
      Updates an existing contact record based on user input. Loads the contact by ID, validates new field values and saves the changes to the database. Shows appropriate error messages for invalid input or database errors.

    • safe

      private String safe(String value)
      Returns a display-safe value for a string.
      Parameters:
      value - original string (can be null)
      Returns:
      "(none)" if value is null, otherwise the original value

    • isValidFirstName

      private boolean isValidFirstName(String name)
      Validates a first name. Accepts at least 2 characters, only letters, spaces and '-'.
      Parameters:
      name - first name to check
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise

    • isValidLastName

      private boolean isValidLastName(String name)
      Validates a last name. Accepts at least 2 characters, only letters or '-', and no spaces.
      Parameters:
      name - last name to check
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise

    • isValidPhoneTail

      private boolean isValidPhoneTail(String phoneTail)
      Validates the last 9 digits of a phone number. Requires exactly 9 numeric characters.
      Parameters:
      phoneTail - last 9 digits to check
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise

    • isValidEmail

      private boolean isValidEmail(String email)
      Validates an email address. Rejects null/empty values, whitespace, multiple '@', and domains without a proper dot (e.g. at least 2 chars after '.').
      Parameters:
      email - email text to check
      Returns:
      true if the email format is acceptable, false otherwise

    • isValidBirthDate

      private boolean isValidBirthDate(String birthDateText)
      Validates a birthdate string. Expects format yyyy-MM-dd and rejects invalid or future dates.
      Parameters:
      birthDateText - birthdate text to check
      Returns:
      true if the date exists and is not in the future, false otherwise
